name: Echo Chamber
description:
Created for the 48 Hour Ludum Dare 37 Game Jam December 9th-11th 2016 - Theme ONE ROOM.

This is a top down Bullet Hell style game.. the Enemy turrets will fire projectiles in a variety of patterns that will bounce off walls. your only defense is your energy shield, which can reflect the shots away from you. Survive as long as you can, gaining points for each shot deflected

Controls
WASD - Movement

Up/Down arrow keys to rotate shield.

Tools:
Unity 5
PyxelEdit
Bosca Ceoil
EverNote
